Limited Time Offer Shipping and Handling Shipping and handling charges covers postage, packing and handling. The charges is non-refundable. We don't offer combine shipping discount because Post Office charges postage by weight, not quantity. Thus items are packed together in one parcel or packed in separately parcel, the postage cost is same. We ship fast within one business day as payment's received Monday to Friday. All orders are shipped from Hong Kong via standard air mail. Estimated delivery times are shown below. • 8 to 28 business days to Australia • 9 to 28 business days to United States and Canada • 9 to 28 business days to United Kingdom • 12 to 28 business days to Germany, France, Netherlands • 21 to 45 business days to Brazil and South America The delivery time could be not guaranteed, as Post Offices and Custom Offices from different countries process mail in a various ways. There could be post office delay, customs delay, storm, peak periods or strike, as example.
